SS chuckled at the thought of ANY Predicon, Decpticon,
or Infecticon (I guess the Inferno would at least know
all the factions) being able to resist him for long.

SS:  Very well.  Name an enemy and you shall have his
head in your hands to mock before the sun sets.

--- airly2000 <airly2000@...> wrote:
> Shivhah:
> 
> "I just reconize as master one bot" said the male
> "But I'm glad that 
> you want to join us..."
> 
>

> wrote:
> > SS: Because you are clearly Predicons.  I love the

> you
> > shall all call me MASTER, but that shall be when
> > neither the Maximals nor any other bots draw
> breath
> > except my slaves.  Until then I am ready to serve.
> > LOLOLOLOLOL!
